story.text: Was coined by [http://ims.dojo.fed.wiki/view/welcome-visitors Inger-Mette Stenseth]  and Bert-Ola Bergstrand in the September of 2020, part of [[Global Impact Playground]] and the visit to Åndalsnes, Norway.

YOUTUBE Kop8W8Fergg
Mission Possible 8  - Clean Rivers - Skiri, Rauma, Norway.
With this challenge to Tom - on the new mission. We also invited Zimbabwe, as part of the Mission Possible 8.
Tom - the Superman - on the next Mission Possible. What will that be? How can the film be like? Probabley 10000000 of small films on Toms` Mission Impossible film budget!
As i type these letters right now, I wonder what Tom will think when he read that we have highjacked his Mission Impossible 8.
Join us Tom - forget the impossible - join us on the pathway of the possible?

To be one of the first countries of the world to be close to ZERO.  Here is the challenge to Zimbabwe? Hope they can rock this mission and surprise the world  - we need the super-power of people making films.

YOUTUBE lyR6IwRymqE
CCN film studio Zimbabwe - the Global Impact Playground of Victory Falls.
Let us look at a film from Victoria Falls - one of the 7 natural wonders of the world.
Let us Pray that the water will fall over the cliffs in 2050  - it might be part of the Mission Possible 8.

YOUTUBE WsMjBMxpUTc
360view of the Vic Falls

YOUTUBE FVFsiJBSQps
On the Edge, sitting on the Devil`s armchair - tougher than Tom!

YOUTUBE pfPMeMGbrj4
OUR RIVERS OF THE WORLD
Mission Possilbe 8  - let us take care of our rivers!
